name: Saint Bernard
description:
There was an avalanche !

As the good Saint Bernard that you are, you will rescue all of the people blocked under the snow with your master.

This game was made in 2 days during my first game jam : Mini Jame Gam #15.

_______Assets credits_______
Font : https://managore.itch.io/m5x7

Sprites :

  • https://pillowbyte.itch.io/slimigrationanimals
